Package ePortfolio

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
ePortfolio.Investment
ePortfolio.Stock
public class Stock extends ePortfolio.Investment
The Stock class represents a stock investment in the ePortfolio system. It stores the symbol, name, quantity, price, and book value of the stock, and provides methods to calculate the gain and the sale payment for the stock. The class also includes getters for the stock's attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stock

      public Stock(String symbol, String name, int quantity, double price) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Stock class constructor - Constructs a new Stock object with the specified symbol, name, quantity, and price. The book value is calculated by multiplying the quantity by the price and adding the commission.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the stock symbol, e.g., APPL for Apple
      name - the company name or stock name, e.g., Apple Inc.
      quantity - the number of shares purchased
      price - the price per share
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • Stock

      public Stock(String symbol, String name, int quantity, double price, double bookValue)
      Stock class constructor - Constructs a new Stock object with the specified symbol, name, quantity, price and bookValue. The book value is set to the bookValue passed
      Parameters:
      symbol - the stock symbol, e.g., APPL for Apple
      name - the company name or stock name, e.g., Apple Inc.
      quantity - the number of shares purchased
      price - the price per share
      bookValue - the stocks new bookValue

  • Method Details

    • getGain

      public double getGain()
      Specified by:
      getGain in class ePortfolio.Investment

    • getSalePayment

      public double getSalePayment()
      Calculates and returns the total payment from the investment sale sale. The sale payment is calculated as (current price * current quantity) - book value.
      Returns:
      the total payment from the stock sale

    • getComission

      public double getComission()
      Returns the commission for buy and sale of stocks (Double)
      Returns:
      the comission

    • calcBookValue

      public double calcBookValue()
      Calculates and returns the book value of the stock investment. The book value is calculated as the price per unit multiplied by the quantity.
      Specified by:
      calcBookValue in class ePortfolio.Investment
      Returns:
      the book value of the stock investment

    • getGain

      public double getGain(double price, int quantity)
      Calculates and returns the gain from the stock investment. The gain is calculated as (price * quantity) - commission - book value.
      Parameters:
      price - the price of the stock
      quantity - the quantity of the stock
      Returns:
      the gain from the stock investment

    • getPayment

      public double getPayment()
      Calculates and returns the payment from the stock sale. The payment is calculated as (price * quantity) - commission.
      Specified by:
      getPayment in class ePortfolio.Investment
      Returns:
      the payment from the stock sale

    • buyMore

      public String buyMore(double price, int quantity)
      Adds more stock investments by increasing the quantity and updating the book value. This method allows the user to buy additional shares of an existing stock at a given price. The total quantity and book value are updated accordingly, and a message is printed to confirm the successful purchase.
      Specified by:
      buyMore in class ePortfolio.Investment
      Parameters:
      price - the price at which the additional shares are purchased
      quantity - the number of additional shares being purchased

    • sellSome

      public String sellSome(double price, int quantity)
      Sells a specified quantity of stock and updates the remaining quantity and book value. The remaining shares and book value are recalculated based on the quantity sold. The method prints detailed information about the sale, including payment and the remaining stock.
      Specified by:
      sellSome in class ePortfolio.Investment
      Parameters:
      price - the price at which the shares are sold
      quantity - the number of shares being sold

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class ePortfolio.Investment
